synopsis.text: Wano arc's eighth recap special brings you a thrilling face-off between the notorious pirate captains, Trafalgar D. Water Law and Eustass Kid, and the formidable Big Mom, one of the Four Emperors of the Sea. Narrated by adorable Chibi versions of Nami and Nico Robin, this episode takes you through the intense struggle of Law and Kid as they face insurmountable odds against Big Mom. Watch as the two captains endure relentless attacks, get pushed to their limits, and rise to challenge Big Mom's overwhelming power in this action-packed recap episode.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
